results.content:
Why is there a blaring 15+ second intro advertising the author's company at the start of every video?

The author's spoken English simply does not cut the mustard for this sort of paid content. And I say that as someone who's taken courses by non-native speakers without any problems before. It certainly doesn't help that the author seems to be speaking into an incredibly cheap, built-in laptop microphone at varying distances throughout the entire course.

Not to mention that the vast majority of the course is the author simply reading off AWS documentation that is available for free to anyone.

I've had nothing but good experiences with Udemy courses before and I usually don't review courses before completing them but this course is so far below the quality standard I've come to expect from this site, both in terms of content and presentation, that I simply don't think I'll be able to force myself to finish this one.

This is the first non-five-star review I leave on this site and it is well deserved. I'm sorely disappointed. Would not recommend to anyone. Simply should not be paid content.
